title: Documentation error example
description:
In the docs it says to run the following example:

java -cp lucene.jar:demo/classes org.apache.lucene.IndexFilesSearchFiles



should be instead 

java -cp lucene.jar:demo/classes org.apache.lucene.SearchFiles

comments.content:
Created an attachment (id=15140)
Same HPFOF trace, patch applied, but with deeper stack trace
